dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement and Domain Dispute Notice - Badpuppy.EU - First Notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of The Planet
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2006 1:08 PM
To: rivers@badpuppy.com; Copyright
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement and Domain Dispute Notice -
Badpuppy.EU - First Notice - Suspense, May 4, 2006]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the address
of copyright@theplanet.com.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement and Domain Dispute Notice -
Badpuppy.EU - First Notice - Suspense, May 4, 2006
Date:         Thu, 27 Apr 2006 14:01:51 -0400
From:         William G Pinyon <rivers@badpuppy.com>
Reply-To:         rivers@badpuppy.com
Organization:         Badpuppy Enterprises, Inc.
To:         <dalibor.milosevic@volja.net>
CC:         abuse@pandora.be, support@de-tel.com, abuse@outlinepress.com,
abuse@volja.net, jacob_randall@nakedarena.com, rivers@badpuppy.com,
lisa@badpuppy.com, badpup2@badpuppy.com, davidp@badpuppy.com, abuse@de-tel.com,
steven@badpuppy.com, admins@theplanet.com, info@outlinepress.com, ben@badpuppy.com,
marc@ossinskycathcart.com, dalibor.milosevic@volja.net, abuse@theplanet.com



Hello,

Please see that attached Copyright Infringement and Domain Dispute Notice for the
domain name of Badpuppy.EU.  All service providers have been properly copied per
DMCA and all necessary documentation is attached.

Pursuant to ADR facilitated by the Prague-based Arbitration Court in the Czech
Republic, ADR Proceedings in line with the Public Policy Rules for .EU of the
European Commission (EC Regulation 874/2004) have been filed.

Please continue below.

Bill
*
William G Pinyon, CEO

Badpuppy Enterprises, Inc.
414 High Point Drive, Cocoa, FL 32926
Phone:   321.631.9500
Los Angeles: 323.201.2134
San Francisco: 415.738.4830
London, England: 0207 993 2576
Website: www.badpuppy.com <http://www.badpuppy.com>




  www.badpuppy.com*_BADPUPPY ENTERPRISES,
  INCORPORATED                                    _*


    */From the desk of...William G. Pinyon, CEO/*


      414 High Point Drive ◊ Cocoa, FL  32926


      Email: rivers@badpuppy.com


      Telephone     321.631.9500                 Facsimile 321.631.8028



April 27, 2006




          CERTIFIED MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED



Copies To: dalibor.milosevic@volja.net
<mailto:dalibor.milosevic@volja.net>, abuse@volja.net <mailto:abuse@volja.net>,
support@de-tel.com <mailto:support@de-tel.com>, abuse@de-tel.com
<mailto:abuse@de-tel.com>, abuse@pandora.be <mailto:abuse@pandora.be>,
admins@theplanet.com <mailto:admins@theplanet.com>, abuse@theplanet.com
<mailto:abuse@theplanet.com>, jacob_randall@nakedarena.com
<mailto:jacob_randall@nakedarena.com>, info@outlinepress.com
<mailto:info@outlinepress.com>, abuse@outlinepress.com
<mailto:abuse@outlinepress.com>,  marc@ossinskycathcart.com
<mailto:marc@ossinskycathcart.com>, rivers@badpuppy.com
<mailto:rivers@badpuppy.com>,  ben@badpuppy.com <mailto:ben@badpuppy.com>,
lisa@badpuppy.com <mailto:lisa@badpuppy.com>, steven@badpuppy.com
<mailto:steven@badpuppy.com>, davidp@badpuppy.com <mailto:davidp@badpuppy.com>,
badpup2@badpuppy.com <mailto:badpup2@badpuppy.com>



Ditka Maucec, In.Life d.d (dalibor.milosevic@volja.net)

+386.14347066

Fax: +386.14744619

Dunajska 22

1151 Ljubljana

Slovenia



Service Providers have been courtesy copied.



Dear Ditka Maucec:



It has come to our attention that the website(s) listed in *Attachment
A* is/are illegally using our NAME to make money.



This letter will serve to introduce myself as the owner and CEO of Badpuppy
Enterprises, Inc. and in compliance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act I
write this letter. It has recently come to our attention that this website(s) is
using a domain name, or the webpage(s) contain a keyword which is owned, by Badpuppy
Enterprises, Inc.  The name “Badpuppy
